name: antiQuarantine
description: Simple MacOS CLI tool for managing quarantine attributes recursively
features: Removes the com.apple.quarantine extended attribute from files on macOS.
Detects whether files are quarantined without modifying them.
Supports batch operations over directories for scanning/removal.
Easy installation and upgrades via Homebrew.

name: Mumist
description: Public Mumble server list and user counter
features: Shows a list of all public Mumble servers with updates every 15 minutes.
Displays the number of users currently connected to each server.
Supports searching and filtering of servers by various criteria.
Shows total user count and statistics graph.
Map of all public mumble servers worldwide.
